abstract: The Swiss Reinsurance Company said on Monday that it had transferred part of its American life insurance business to Berkshire Hathaway, the conglomerate controlled by the billionaire investor Warren E. Buffett, for $1.27 billion.
snippet: The Swiss Reinsurance Company said on Monday that it had transferred part of its American life insurance business to Berkshire Hathaway, the conglomerate controlled by the billionaire investor Warren E. Buffett, for $1.27 billion.
lead_paragraph: The Swiss Reinsurance Company said on Monday that it had transferred part of its American life insurance business to Berkshire Hathaway, the conglomerate controlled by Warren E. Buffett, for 1.3 billion Swiss francs ($1.27 billion) to free up capital and invest it more profitably.

headline.main: Swiss Re Gets $1.27 Billion in Deal With Buffett

abstract: Warren E. Buffett is expected to approve a 50-to-1 share split of Berkshire Hathaway’s Class B shares on Wednesday, bringing their price down from about $3,247 to roughly $65 a piece, The Wall Street Journal reported.
snippet: Warren E. Buffett is expected to approve a 50-to-1 share split of Berkshire Hathaway’s Class B shares on Wednesday, bringing their price down from about $3,247 to roughly $65 a piece, The Wall Street Journal reported.
lead_paragraph: Admirers of Warren E. Buffett who find Berkshire Hathaway‘s shares a little too rich for their blood may be in luck.

headline.main: Berkshire Said to Consider Stock Split of B Shares

abstract: The billionaire Warren E. Buffett, whose investment vehicle owns 4.5 percent of Posco, the world’s No. 4 steelmaker, has indicated he wants to buy more stock in the company.
snippet: The billionaire Warren E. Buffett, whose investment vehicle owns 4.5 percent of Posco, the world’s No. 4 steelmaker, has indicated he wants to buy more stock in the company.
lead_paragraph: Posco of South Korea said Tuesday that Warren E. Buffett, whose investment vehicle owns 4.5 percent of Posco, the world’s No. 4 steelmaker, had indicated he wanted to buy more stock, Reuters reported.

headline.main: Posco Says Buffett Wants to Buy More Shares
